10/10 		how is it possible to fit this much into ten episodes

7.2/10 		the steve jobs bit was the funniest joke ive heard in anime, it was out of nowhere
(Tokyo Ghoul)
6.1/10 		this is more edgy then the manga without any of the proper character development stopping it from being completely edgy like the manga did
(Dorohedoro)
8.3/10 		good but the art and just general it isnt as good as the manga but ebisu in the shark costume was definitely better than the manga. still it is worth a watch if you are unwilling to read the manga.
(Hinamatsuri)
8.6/10 		funny with incredible animation, if only there was more
(Nichijou - My Ordinary Life)
2.9/10 		its just not funny man edit:, usually a fan of absurdist comedy but this just doesnt do it for me
(Demon Slayer)
8.1/10 		wow the animation is insane also the entertainment district was peak
(Five Nights at Freddy's)
